name: Lemonade Stand
description:
You have just gotten your very own lemonade stand! 

What will you do?? 

-Fight 

-Act 

(Wait this isn't an RPG game how did that get in here?) 

Anyways... You can buy more ingredients, upgrades, and you can even change what is on your greenscr-I mean what your background is!

Sell people overpriced Lemonade!

Capitalism!

Who doesn't want numbers to keep getting exponentially bigger?
